"A.P.238/4/9/11:30":
"This is the end of the forest area,
huh. Looks like we can take a break here."
"Watching you fight though, I don't think you need one."
"Every time I see you, you seem to get more refined. Honestly, I'm pretty jealous of how fast you've grown."
"Movement like that... I heard it only comes from relentless training that's been repeated over and over again."
"I don't know how much of that you can have done in such a short time..."
"Oh, sorry. It sounded like I was having a go at you or something."
"It's not bad to be strong. As long as you don't push yourself too hard, it's definitely a good thing."
"Hahahaha! Hey there, participants! I hope you're enjoying yourselves!"
"Ugh, I want to take part too..."
"Hm... is someone calling?"
"Please disconnect that communicator! Ahem... time to report the current standing!"
"...Right now, the pair in the lead is the pair of <%me> and the Hunter Sara!"
"What? Wow! No way, something that needs my power?! Maria even asked for me personally!"
"It seems that Ohza the Hunter and the Force Marlu are trying their best as well!"
"Okay, I got it! On my way!"
"Nonetheless, it's neck-and-neck! The ARKS Battle Championship is a fierce struggle! The tide could turn at any moment!"
"I found something more fun, Clarissa! Sortie, quickly!"
"The second half of the game begins here, so... Aw, come on!"
"Claris Claes! You're supposed to be helping with this event, don't disappear on me!"
"Well, I guess it looked fun! The second half of the game begins here, so we expect you to do your best! That's all!"
"...Seems like that old hag has left. I can stick around, then..."
"Huh? Oh, sorry. Forget you heard that."
"Anyway, it looks like we can keep our lead by carrying on as we are."
